description: Try this broad bean and two-cheese ravioli recipe for a meat-free Monday. Filled with danish feta, ricotta, zucchini and lemon, it’s perfect as an entrée or main.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Zucchini,Microwave,Soy free,Tree nut free,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Broad Bean & Feta Ravioli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs mint leaves, plus extra leaves to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place broad beans in a microwavesafe bowl. Cover with boiling water. Microwave on high for 3 minutes. Drain, peel and reserve some of the beans for serving. Roughly mash remaining beans with a fork. Mix in ricotta, feta, chopped mint and zest. Season to taste.

Place half the gow gee pastry on a clean bench. Top each with a heaped tablespoon of bean mixture and lightly brush edges with a little egg. Top with a second pastry and press edges together firmly to seal. Repeat to make 15 ravioli.

Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil. Add ravioli, in 3 batches, to boiling water and stir once. Cook for 23 minutes or until they float to the surface. Drain and divide among 4 shallow bowls.

Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook zucchini for 1 minute or until just tender. Add tomato and lemon juice. Spoon over ravioli with reserved beans. Garnish with extra mint and season with pepper.
